geography: A large public plaza in Fish-Man Island where major events and gatherings take place

keyEvents.title: Ground Collapse from Daruma's Attack
keyEvents.description: Daruma uses his Cookie Cutter ability to create underground tunnels, then collapses the ground with Daruma Drop, creating large pitfalls in the plaza.
keyEvents.significance: The collapsing ground forces Franky to reveal his ultimate weapon, General Franky.

keyEvents.title: General Franky Debut
keyEvents.description: Franky debuts his giant battle mecha General Franky in the plaza during the battle against the New Fishman Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of one of Franky's most iconic post-timeskip abilities in this location.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Hody Confrontation Begins
keyEvents.description: Luffy reaches Hody Jones in the plaza, setting up their direct confrontation.
keyEvents.significance: The plaza serves as the battleground for the climactic conflict of the Fish-Man Island arc.

culturalSignificance: Central location for the battle between the Straw Hat Pirates and the New Fishman Pirates

geography: A massive ancient ship, roughly half the size of Fish-Man Island itself, located in the Sea Forest

keyEvents.title: Noah Appears on Collision Course
keyEvents.description: The massive ship Noah suddenly appears descending toward Fish-Man Island on a direct collision course, threatening to destroy the entire island.
keyEvents.significance: Escalates the crisis beyond just defeating Hody Jones, introducing an existential threat to Fish-Man Island tied to ancient history and Joy Boy's promise.

culturalSignificance: An ancient ship connected to Joy Boy's promise to the people of Fish-Man Island. Known as the 'Ship of Promise' meant to one day bring the fish-men and merfolk to the surface. A Poneglyph in the Sea Forest contains Joy Boy's apology for breaking his promise regarding this ship.

historicalEvents.description: Joy Boy made a promise to use Noah to bring the people of Fish-Man Island to the surface, but failed to fulfill it, leaving an apology on a Poneglyph.

geography: An underwater island located 10,000 meters below sea level, beneath the Red Line. Home to fish-men and merfolk, protected by a giant bubble.

keyEvents.title: Noah Threatens the Island
keyEvents.description: Noah appears on a collision course with Fish-Man Island, threatening complete destruction of the island and all its inhabitants.
keyEvents.significance: The entire island faces an existential threat that could fulfill Madam Shyarly's prophecy about the island's destruction.

culturalSignificance: Homeland of fish-men and merfolk, connected to ancient prophecies and Joy Boy's promise
